item.title: Giving Darts Projectiles? & Running to Range if to far away?
item.dc:creator: @Craigl Craigl
item.description:
@Craigl wrote:

Hi,

Once again another help thread by me

Here the thing, Knifes in delta are disabled… what ever i try i cant enable them.

So im going with darts. When you wield them theres the normal options of rapid etc. So the wielding is right.

Just wondering how i can make them so that they are a projectile and make them so you can range from same distance as range?

Thanks, now question 2.

On delta you get the stupid message of " You are too far away to range this person "

Heres the code that make its say that:

if(UseBow || UseCrossBow || UseRing){
if(GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 8) == false){
sM("You are too far to range your enemy!");
ResetAttack();
return false;
}
}

Now heres what i was thinking:

if(UseBow || UseCrossBow || UseRing){
if(GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 8) == false) 
If(BadDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, >8) == ############

Okai. You can laugh at my guess how to fix. The #### would be telling it to walk / run to 8 squares away.

This is completely wrong i know. It was just to explain what im asking. Basicly… how do i make the player run to 8 squares away if they are over the 8 sqaures.

Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Giving Darts Projectiles? & Running to Range if to far away?
